#summary What are the system requirements for GWT?

= What are the system requirements for GWT? =

Google Web Toolkit is designed to run on systems that meet the following requirements:

    * Java: Sun Java 2 Runtime Environment 1.4.2+ (1.5 will be supported in the upcoming release of GWT 1.5)
    * Operating system: Windows XP/2000, Mac OS X (Leopard), or Linux w/ GTK+ 2.2.1+
    * Hardware: ~100MB of free disk space, 512MB RAM

If you have trouble running GWT, and your system meets the requirements above, let us know on the [http://groups.google.com/group/Google-Web-Toolkit GWT developer discussion group].
